auto, menu, weapon, voice, item, body, local, music, announcer (default = auto)

whether this sound is "looping" or "nonlooping" (default = "nonlooping")

if "master", this is a master sound.  If a number, then this sound's volume will be multiplied by that number (a percentage between 0 and 1) any master sound is playing.  If blank, then neither master nor slave.

this determines what percentage of the volume should be redirected to the center channel (equal percentage taken from all speakers).
